definition: general term for milk packaged for the consumer, including long-life (UHT) milk, pasteurized milk and reconstituted milk
liquid water (as opposed to steam or ice)

sentences.english: It is a kind of liquid medicine , and can kill the epiphyte.
sentences.chinese: 一种液态药水，可以杀死真菌。

sentences.english: In all tests video card and processor were cooled by liquid nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 在所有测试的显示卡和处理器被冷却的液态氮。

sentences.english: Chemical features of these granites are consistent with silicate liquid immiscibility.
sentences.chinese: 它们的化学特征可以用硅酸盐液态不混熔来解释。

sentences.english: There have been no reported cases of sickness caused by drinking liquid milk, CCTV said.
sentences.chinese: CCTV还说，没有报道因喝液态奶引起的病例。

sentences.english: Among all kinds of fuel-spilled-fires, pool fire under windy conditions is the most common one.
sentences.chinese: 典型的燃油泄漏火灾多是有风条件下的液态池火燃烧。

sentences.english: The liquid-phase sample injection valve ensured the sampling reproducibility.
sentences.chinese: 使用液相进样阀液态直接进样保证了试样的代表性。

sentences.english: An amalgan is a solution of a metal in liquid Hg.
sentences.chinese: 汞齐是金属在液态汞中的溶液。

sentences.english: You can also add 10 drops of colloidal silver as a natural preservative.
sentences.chinese: 你可以加入10滴液态胶粒银作为天然的防腐剂。

sentences.english: The text mainly gives a study on mid-experiment processing of the high calcium milk.
sentences.chinese: 对高钙液态奶中试加工工艺进行了研究。

sentences.english: How do you avoid the summer liquid diet weight gain?
sentences.chinese: 你如何避免夏季液态饮食增加体重呢？

sentences.english: Second statement: Bromine liquid is reddish brown in color.
sentences.chinese: 第二句，液态溴是啡红色的。
六听一组的饮料完全是液态的。

sentences.english: The silica coating prevents the water droplets fromcombining and turning back into a liquid.
sentences.chinese: 硅层可防止小水滴结合在一起，重新回归液态。

sentences.english: This gas is also what causes the liquid mousse to turn all foamy.
sentences.chinese: 这些气体还可以将液态状的摩丝转换成泡沫状。

sentences.english: The chemical was also found in liquid milk , yogurt and other products.
sentences.chinese: 化学还发现在液态奶，酸奶和其他产品。

sentences.english: The smelted liquid slag then change to cement mature after sprinkle cooling.
sentences.chinese: 冶炼后的液态渣经过热泼等处理即成为水泥熟料。
